description: Theta series of Borcherds' 27-dimensional unimodular lattice U_27.
references: R. Bacher and B. B. Venkov, Reseaux entiers unimodulaires sans racine en dimension 27 et 28, in Reseaux euclidiens, designs spheriques et formes modulaires, pp. 212-267, Enseignement Math., Geneva, 2001.
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, preface to 3rd edition.
links: R. Bacher and B. B. Venkov, Reseaux entiers unimodulaires sans racine en dimension 27 et 28 (html, ps).
N. Heninger, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, On the Integrality of n-th Roots of Generating Functions, J. Combinatorial Theory, Series A, 113 (2006), 1732-1745.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
